## newRaceCancel() function

Create a [RaceCancelFn](./race-cancellation.racecancelfn.md) function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function newRaceCancel(isCancelled: IsCancelledFn, executor: CancelExecutorFn, cancelReason?: (() => CancelReason | undefined) | CancelReason): RaceCancelFn;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  isCancelled | [IsCancelledFn](./race-cancellation.iscancelledfn.md) | a function that returns whether or not we are currently cancelled |
|  executor | [CancelExecutorFn](./race-cancellation.cancelexecutorfn.md) | a callback to resolve the cancellation |
|  cancelReason | (() =&gt; [CancelReason](./race-cancellation.cancelreason.md) \| undefined) \| [CancelReason](./race-cancellation.cancelreason.md) | an optional reason for the cancellation |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RaceCancelFn](./race-cancellation.racecancelfn.md)
